definition: Hure banner or Xüree khoshuu in Tongliao 通遼|通辽[Tong1 liao2], Inner Mongolia
banner/flag/(in Qing times) Manchu (cf. 八旗[Ba1 qi2])/administrative subdivision in inner Mongolia equivalent to 縣|县[xian4] county/CL:面[mian4]

sentences.english: Through 15 years' major harnessment in Kulun county, the grain production has been increased obviously.
sentences.chinese: 庫倫旗經過15年重點治理，糧食產量明顯增加。
